meanings.definition: The spreading of rumors or gossip.
meanings.sent1: Her constant rumormongering caused unnecessary drama in the office.
meanings.sent2: The community was tired of the rumormongering about the new family in town.
meanings.sent3: The rumormongering at school was so exaggerated that it became like a game of telephone.
meanings.sent4: The rumormongering in the small town spread faster than a wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of her rumormongering were evident in the strained relationships around her.

meanings.definition: Someone who spreads rumors or gossip.
meanings.sent1: The rumormongering was so hurtful that it led to a loss of friendships.
meanings.sent2: As a known rumormongering, he was not trusted with sensitive information.
meanings.sent3: The rumormongering in the group chat was like a never-ending soap opera.
meanings.sent4: She was a master of rumormongering, always knowing the latest gossip.
meanings.sent5: The rumormongering at the office made it hard for anyone to feel safe sharing personal news.
